collections.name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
collections.description: The Metropolitan Museum of Art is the most popular art museum in the United States.

collections.name: The Smithsonian Institution
collections.description: The Smithsonian Institution is the world's largest museum, education, and research complex.

collections.name: The Biodiversity Heritage Library
collections.description: The Biodiversity Heritage Library is the world's largest open access digital library for biodiversity literature and archives.

collections.name: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration
collections.description: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration is the global leader in space exploration.
